hero.title: Arquers Club Castelldefels
hero.subtitle: Precision and Tradition
hero.description: Archery club in Castelldefels with over 25 years of experience. Join our community of Catalan archers and discover the ancient art of sport archery.
hero.detailedDescription: We offer archer training courses, specialized training in recurve bow and compound bow, and activities for all ages. From beginners to Olympic competitors, we develop your technique in the sport of archery.

courses.title: Training Courses
courses.description: Learn archery from scratch with certified instructors

location.title: Castelldefels Location
location.description: Shooting range equipped with the latest technology in Catalonia

community.title: Archer Community
community.description: Join tournaments, competitions and archery activities in Barcelona

about.title: Arquers Club Castelldefels
about.subtitle: Archery Club in Catalonia since 1998
about.description1: The Arquers Club Castelldefels is a sport archery club located in Castelldefels, Barcelona, with more than 25 years of experience in archer training and the practice of archery in Catalonia.
about.description2: We offer archery courses for beginners and specialized training in recurve bow and compound bow. Our instructors certified by the Catalan Archery Federation guarantee quality training in the Olympic sport of archery.

features.certifiedDescription: Trainers with international certification and years of experience
features.facilitiesDescription: Recurve bow, compound, traditional and field archery

programs.title: Archery Courses and Programs
programs.subtitle: We offer archer training courses and specialized programs in recurve bow and compound bow for all ages, from archery initiation to sports competition in Castelldefels, Barcelona.

beginner.title: Archery Initiation Course
beginner.description: Basic 8-week archer training course designed for beginners. Learn the fundamental techniques of sport archery, safety rules and professional handling of archery equipment.

intermediate.title: Specialized Training
intermediate.description: Advanced program for experienced archers who seek to improve their technique and participate in official competitions.

youth.title: Youth Archery
youth.description: Special program designed for children and youth, focused on developing skills and values through the sport of archery.

cta.notFound: Can't find the program you're looking for?

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Interested in becoming part of Arquers Club Castelldefels? Contact us for more information about our archery courses.

footer.description: Arquers Club Castelldefels is your archery club in Catalonia. Join our community of archers and discover the passion for the sport of archery.

accessibility.scrollDown: Scroll down to see more content

seo.metaTitle: Arquers Club Castelldefels - Archery Club in Catalonia | Courses and Training
seo.metaDescription: Archery club in Castelldefels with more than 25 years of experience. Training courses, specialized training and activities for all ages. Discover archery in Catalonia!
